name: Skype Plugin Archive
summary: Learn about .SPARC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: For some Skype versions, the Extras Manager is an optional component that can be included with the Skype installation. If you download a SPARC file but can't install it, you may have not included Extras Manager in the installation. To fix this, reinstall Skype and select the Extras Manager option.
NOTE: Extras can be managed in Skype by selecting Tools → Extras → Organize Your Extras.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
